(I didn't expect that Wheeljack did that with the Vamprah's probre, I 
like use that for get a conteact with Zardus, well I hope that you 
can cacht one of my Bat probes 'cause one of them is going to Zardus 
Ship or carry the probe to him.)

:: The Probe ::

Due Wheeljack dropped out, the message that its conttained appeared:

A Dark Shadow appears and isn't able to identifya if its was a male 
or a femme bot.. With a soft voice like a old mand the hologram spoke:

"Menssage to Zardus... Alliance Leader..."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> (Okay, sorry about moding with Skulletron, it's just that I am 
totally PISSED at something..............Personal matters........And, 
here's a reply to Gotron and Starscream)
> 
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>          Skulletron starts to walk around the Maximal base, ready 
for anybody who wanted to take him on.  He stomped his path, in 
anger, waiting for somebody to kill.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Dollen::
> 
>         As GoldenEye stopped him, Dollen sighed.  Then, he suddenly 
had a very serious, angry expression.
> 
>           "Look, let's just go back to the group ok??  I have no 
time to waste talking about this right now!" He said.
> 
>       Dollen had never been this angry before.  Something was 
bugging him, but, he didn't know what, why.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Wheeljack::
> 
>         Wheeljack sighed as the probe reacted strange.  Oh well.
> 
>       "Hey, how exactly DO we get this back to base??" Wheeljack 
said, dropping the probe off his forehead.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ::Dark Lavacons::
> 
>            The Dark Lavacons all got into military fashion, 
following Starscream.  They were getting bored though, they couldn't 
wait to go do some killing.
